# Q018 Show Your Work
^question Q018
^type math_working
^identifier MW_Q001
^title Quadratic Equation
^points 10
^labels #Math #Algebra #Evaluate #Hard

@field: question_text
Solve the following quadratic equation and show all your work:

**x² - 5x + 6 = 0**

Find all values of x.
@end_field

@field: editor_config
^Initial_lines 5
^Field_width 100%
^Editor_prompt Enter your solution step by step...
@end_field

@field: scoring_rubric
| Points | Criteria |
|--------|----------|
| 10 | Complete solution with factoring or quadratic formula, both roots found |
| 7 | Correct method with minor errors, at least one root found |
| 4 | Shows understanding of method but significant errors |
| 0 | Incorrect method or missing |
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
Solution: x² - 5x + 6 = 0
Factor: (x - 2)(x - 3) = 0
Therefore: x = 2 or x = 3
@@end_field

@@field: answered_feedback
Your work has been submitted for review.
@@end_field

@@field: unanswered_feedback
Please show your mathematical work.
@@end_field

@end_field
